name: Enweby Pretty Product Quick View for WooCommerce
author: Enweby

sections.description:
Pretty Product Quick View is a lightweight plugin by Enweby Solutions to display quick view popup on woocommerce shop, archive, and tag pages.

Admin can customize Product Quick View button and popup using admin settings options. Admin can easily change popup position, popup color, quick view button’s text and color.

Plugin contains an inbuilt color picker to choose color easily and change the behavior of plugin.

Pretty Product Quick Features

👉 Set Quick View Button Position.
Admin can set position of Quick View button on product on the shop/archive page. There are five position options which admin can set. They are as follows

  • After Product Image
  • After Product Title
  • After Product Price
  • After Add to Cart Button
  • On Product Image Hover

👉 Customize Button Text
Admin can change button text to any text. Default text is “Quick View” which can be changed to any text of your choice.

👉 Set Button Text color
Admin can Set Button Text color. Any color can be used using easy to use inbuilt color picker.

👉 Set Button Text color on hover
Admin can also set hover color for Quick View button text so that if someone hovers over the button, text color can also be changed.

👉 Set Button Color
Admin can set Quick View button color using inbuilt color picker.

👉 Set Button color on hover
Admin can set Quick View button hover color using inbuilt color picker.

👉 Set Font size of button text
Product Quick View plugin also enables to choose preferable font size for quick view button text.

👉 Customize Modal window background color
Plugin also enables admin to choose background color of Quick View popup.

👉 Set closing button color
Admin can also choose closing button color using inbuilt color picker.

👉 Set closing button color on hover
Admin can also easily set closing button hover color on Quick View popup.

Plugin Demo

👉 View Plugin Demo

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION (EASIEST WAY)

To do an automatic install of ‘Enweby Pretty Product Quick View’, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type ‘Enweby Pretty Product Quick View’ by Enweby.

Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now” and then “Activate”.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

Installing through WordPress Dashboard

  • Download enweby-pretty-product-quick-view.zip

  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard

  • Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area

  • Select enweby-pretty-product-quick-view.zip from your computer

  • Click ‘Install Now’

  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  • Download enweby-pretty-product-quick-view.zip

  • Extract the enweby-pretty-product-quick-view.zip to your computer

  • Upload the enweby-pretty-product-quick-view directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Q. Where are this plugin’s Settings located?

A. After activating the plugin, you can click on settings link under the plugin or on the link “Pretty Product Quick View” on left side navigation. From there, you can view and change settings.

Q. Can I change Quick View button’s label/text myself?

A. Yes you can easily change Quick View button’s label or text through admin.

Q. Can I change styles and color of Quick View popup or Quick View button?

A. Yes of course, You can styles and color of Quick View popup or Quick View button right through admin settings.

Q. I have a question about the plugin where should I contact?

A. You can contact to our support on this page https://support.enweby.com/ and can your questions on the support forum here on WordPress.org. We will try to respond to every question within 48 hours.

Q. How can I request a feature or encourage future development?

A. You can contact to our support on this page https://support.enweby.com/. If you require any customizations you can contact our support. Support link is also given above in description.
